title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a built-in model library and simple REST/CLI interface.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and async helpers for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (now Open WebUI) that plugs into any Ollama instance.

title: continue
summary: VS Code & JetBrains plugin that adds local AI code completion via Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset for retrieval pipelines using Ollama generators & embedders.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Community fork enabling GitHub Copilot.vim to use Ollama backends instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using llama.cpp embeddings + Ollama for question answering.

title: ollama-cli
summary: NPM CLI utility to pull, list, delete and chat with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, embed, and vision endpoints.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) with docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All chat UI that can swap backend to Ollama via REST setting.

title: ollama-modalbert
summary: Experimental project serving multimodal (vision+text) models like LLaVA through Ollama.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that answers questions using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app adding Ollama chat & embed endpoints with admin UI.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component template for quick internal chatbots backed by Ollama.
